abstract.text: A drop-in class that presents a sheet for a customer to complete their payment

PaymentSheet is a prebuilt UI that combines all the steps required to pay - collecting payment details, billing details, and confirming the payment - into a single sheet that displays on top of your app.
A button which presents a sheet for a customer to select a payment method.
This is a convenience wrapper for the .paymentOptionsSheet() ViewModifier.
A class that presents the individual steps of a payment flow
